long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Crypto Wallet and Gateway to dApps. Buy, store, send and swap tokens by using D-Wallet Extension wallet. It provides you with a key vault and secure login, token wallet, token exchange and Fiat to Crypto and vice versa swap options. D-Wallet allows you to add N number of EVM based wallets into its system. It will be a gateway to all Decentralised Applications. 

A fiat to cryptocurrency conversion gateway in D-wallet allows you to buy crypto assets such as Ethereum, Matic, Solana, and so on. It allows you to buy 80+ cryptocurrency directly into your D-wallet.
